content: this is a summary of a legal case that took place in the klaipėda district court the court made a final decision regarding the division of matrimonial property the applicant was awarded the property acquired during the marriage including a vehicle while the defendant was awarded certain household items the court discussed two articles from the civil code one about establishing the balance of assets and the other about indivisible assets the applicant is seeking to dissolve their marriage retain their married name establish custody of their son and receive monthly maintenance payments from the defendant the defendant expressed a desire to save the marriage but agreed to the applicants requests regarding property division and custody the court considered the best interests of the child in determining child support and contact arrangements the court found that the dissolution of the marriage was the fault of both parties and divided the joint property accordingly the court imposed interim measures and ordered the defendant to pay the costs of the proceedings the revised application was upheld resulting in the divorce of the parties involved

metadata.cost: 62.00 EUR (stamp duty) + 741.00 EUR(professional fees + stamp duty of the applicant) + 42.00 EUR (court fees) to be borne by the defendant
